name: Rift Wrecker
description:
Made in May 2017 for the Make-A-Thing GameJam. Every Jam, we receive three words to go after. This year, the words were:

Cascade
Sundown
Split

In this game, You as the player have to stop the Cascade of enemies by destroying the Rifts (a split in time), Whilst taking shelter in the "Sundown Shop"

Music by Kevin Mcleod

Exhilarate, Bit Quest, Gypsy Shoegazer & Take The Lead Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
